description: Successful av engine/pattern update.

event.Summary: Antivirus engine or pattern update successful

objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD BLUECOAT-AV-MIB::avAntivirusUpdateSuccess BLUECOAT-AV-MIB::avVendorName s EXAMPLE BLUECOAT-AV-MIB::avEngineVersion s EXAMPLE BLUECOAT-AV-MIB::avPatternVersion s EXAMPLE BLUECOAT-AV-MIB::avPatternDateTime s EXAMPLEE

description: AV vendor name.
variables.name: BLUECOAT-AV-MIB::avVendorName

description: AV engine version.
variables.name: BLUECOAT-AV-MIB::avEngineVersion

description: AV pattern version.
variables.name: BLUECOAT-AV-MIB::avPatternVersion

description: Release date and time of the av pattern.
variables.name: BLUECOAT-AV-MIB::avPatternDateTime

description: Av engine/pattern update failed, avUpdateFailureReason provides more details.

event.Summary: Antivirus engine or pattern update failed: $v1

objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD BLUECOAT-AV-MIB::avAntivirusUpdateFailed BLUECOAT-AV-MIB::avUpdateFailureReason s EXAMPLE BLUECOAT-AV-MIB::avVendorName s EXAMPLE BLUECOAT-AV-MIB::avEngineVersion s EXAMPLE BLUECOAT-AV-MIB::avPatternVersion s EXAMPLE BLUECOAT-AV-MIB::avPatternDateTime s EXAMPLEE

description: The reason why the av engine/pattern/firmware update failed.

description: AV vendor name.

description: AV engine version.
variables.name: BLUECOAT-AV-MIB::avEngineVersion

description: AV pattern version.
variables.name: BLUECOAT-AV-MIB::avPatternVersion

description: Release date and time of the av pattern.
variables.name: BLUECOAT-AV-MIB::avPatternDateTime

description: Infected file detected at avUrl.
objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD BLUECOAT-AV-MIB::avVirusDetected BLUECOAT-AV-MIB::avUrl s EXAMPLE BLUECOAT-AV-MIB::avVirusName s EXAMPLE BLUECOAT-AV-MIB::avVirusDetails s EXAMPLE

description: The URL for use in notifications.
variables.name: BLUECOAT-AV-MIB::avUrl

description: The name of the infection found.
variables.name: BLUECOAT-AV-MIB::avVirusName

description: More details about the infection found.
variables.name: BLUECOAT-AV-MIB::avVirusDetails

description: File served without scanning. It could not be scanned completely due to a scan exception.
objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD BLUECOAT-AV-MIB::avFileServed BLUECOAT-AV-MIB::avUrl s EXAMPLE BLUECOAT-AV-MIB::avErrorCode s EXAMPLE BLUECOAT-AV-MIB::avErrorDetails s EXAMPLE

description: The URL for use in notifications.
variables.name: BLUECOAT-AV-MIB::avUrl

description: Error code identifying the scan exception, like max_file_size_exceeded.
variables.name: BLUECOAT-AV-MIB::avErrorCode

description: More details about the scan exception.
variables.name: BLUECOAT-AV-MIB::avErrorDetails

description: File blocked. It could not be scanned completely due to a scan exception.

event.Summary: File blocked due to a scan exception: $v2

objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD BLUECOAT-AV-MIB::avFileBlocked BLUECOAT-AV-MIB::avUrl s EXAMPLE BLUECOAT-AV-MIB::avErrorCode s EXAMPLE BLUECOAT-AV-MIB::avErrorDetails s EXAMPLE

threshold value.
objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD BLUECOAT-AV-MIB::avICTMWarning BLUECOAT-AV-MIB::avICTMWarningReason s EXAMPLE BLUECOAT-AV-MIB::avSlowICAPConnections u 9999

description: The reason of the Intelligent Connection Traffic Monitoring warning.
variables.name: BLUECOAT-AV-MIB::avICTMWarningReason

description: The number of ICAP connections that are considered 'slow' -
receiving data for more than the configured time threshold
(by default 60 seconds).
